country.title: Country
country.description: Country code override when issuing with taxes applied from different countries.

cat.title: Category
cat.description: Tax category code from those available inside a region.

key.description: Key helps determine the tax situation within the category.

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: Rate within a category and for a given key to apply.

percent.title: Percent
percent.description:
Percent defines the percentage set manually or determined from the
key. A nil percent implies that this tax combo is either exempt or not-subject.

surcharge.title: Surcharge
surcharge.description: Some countries require an additional surcharge (may be determined if key present).

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Local codes that apply for a given rate or percentage that need to be identified and validated.

Combo.description: Combo represents the tax combination of a category code and rate key.

Set.description: Set defines a list of tax categories and their rates to be used alongside taxable items.
